subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: The Los Angeles Galaxy have traded midfielder Santino Quaranta to the Red Bulls for a conditional pick in the fourth round of next year’s Major League Soccer draft. Quaranta, 22, appeared in six games for the Galaxy this season. He has goals 17 in 80 regular-season M.L.S. games.
